about_the_game:
Defend your home planet from ever increasing hordes of creatures in this Atari styled roguelite!


This game is an adaptation of a never seen before Atari game that I'm in possesion of, although Its contents are heavily damaged, I'm hoping that this game gives off what the original devs at Hermit-Host were intending!

This Game Features:
* A Full Fledged Story Mode
* An Endless Mode
* An Intuitive Tutorial
* 3 Playable Characters
* A Logbook With Unlockable Entries
* An Original Soundtrack!
* And More!!!!

and with that being said,

Zragg on.
detailed_description:
Defend your home planet from ever increasing hordes of creatures in this Atari styled roguelite!


This game is an adaptation of a never seen before Atari game that I'm in possesion of, although Its contents are heavily damaged, I'm hoping that this game gives off what the original devs at Hermit-Host were intending!

This Game Features:
* A Full Fledged Story Mode
* An Endless Mode
* An Intuitive Tutorial
* 3 Playable Characters
* A Logbook With Unlockable Entries
* An Original Soundtrack!
* And More!!!!

and with that being said,

Zragg on.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Modern Linux Operating System
  • Processor: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 710 (or integrated graphics)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: it will run fine. dont worry.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any Modern Linux Operating System
  • Processor: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 & Above (AMD prefered)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: it will run fine. dont worry.
